name: Waiting Planet
description:
Waiting Planet, a videogame for the GAMEE Construct game Jam, created in one month.

Waiting Planet is a simple game for 2 people! in this game you have to battle, kill monsters and survive in two dangerous maps! The goal is to get more points than your opponent, you can get points by killing monsters or by surviving! Good luck!

--Controls--

Mobile >> Move: Joypad - Attack: attack button (bottom-left corner)

PC >> Move: joypad - Attack: Q

Special thanks to:

-Samuele Sciacca https://www.youtube.com/user/samuelesciacca

- Vincenzo Striano
